cards.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#乐正龙牙# \r\n在上周的画兽耳活动中，我收到了很多有趣的画作和想法，有朋友还贴心设计了两对耳机，让我不仅体验了毛绒绒的兽耳，还体验了传说中的四声道。\r\n十分感谢大家的创作，每一张我都有看见，每一张都很可爱[乐正龙牙3rd_已阅]很遗憾这里只能展示部分作品，更多内容请大家到超话欣赏[乐正龙牙3rd_送花]","id":180056976,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1000,"img_size":1032.660034179688,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/bb2203a0e964736aee58412f2f6e090968bccbdd.png","img_tags":null,"img_width":1000},{"img_height":1000,"img_size":391.5,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/9826291bc89e362d1f1e16adc6d949dd7872af86.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1000},{"img_height":1000,"img_size":407.760009765625,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/8e71031d9a34f6f2ea972bc06802231cab5f5a72.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1000},{"img_height":1000,"img_size":822.739990234375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/d99df7a6ea248194da15c12003472494078c758c.png","img_tags":null,"img_width":1000}],"pictures_count":4,"reply":23,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1640258988},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/144cf2669d1177257181a4d7c8008d3755487ca7.jpg","name":"乐正龙牙","uid":406948857,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1562774400000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}

cards.card: { "id": 13831713, "category": { "id": 39, "parent_id": 29, "name": "音乐舞蹈" }, "categories": [ { "id": 29, "parent_id": 0, "name": "兴趣" }, { "id": 39, "parent_id": 29, "name": "音乐舞蹈" } ], "title": "【2021乐正龙牙生日应援】活动获奖结果公布", "summary": "远处那座灯塔，让我们相聚在一起，也给了我们落笔的勇气。感谢大家在#2021乐正龙牙生日应援#话题中为我创作的生贺作品，下面就是公布获奖者的时间了。首先，让我们一起来回顾一下今年的生日贺曲《灯塔》吧。将信念当作唯一的行李，凭借疏离的笔迹，赴一场漂泊的旅途。 我想重新点燃这座诗的《灯塔》，希望这一束光，能照亮你的孤独……优秀应援作品（排名不分先后）以下稿件将获得【2021乐正龙牙生日】周边套装恭喜以上获奖的创作者们，也期待大家未来的更多作品！", "banner_url": "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/article\/b53fae9d6c171aafbf219e102a0c0853805feabe.jpg", "template_id": 4, "state": 0, "author": { "mid": 406948857, "name": "乐正龙牙", "face": "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/144cf2669d1177257181a4d7c8008d3755487ca7.jpg", "pendant": { "pid": 2821, "name": "乐正龙牙三周年", "image": "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/garb\/item\/0fa41705cdbb7e407aa566cdb83a8e3f7ff76ebe.png", "expire": 0 }, "official_verify": { "type": 0, "desc": "乐正龙牙官方账号" }, "nameplate": { "nid": 0, "name": "", "image": "", "image_small": "", "level": "", "condition": "" }, "vip": { "type": 1, "status": 0, "due_date": 0, "vip_pay_type": 0, "theme_type": 0, "label": { "path": "", "text": "", "label_theme": "" }, "avatar_subscript": 0, "nickname_color": "" } }, "reprint": 0, "image_urls": [ "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/article\/bf118304d6142656c08384a95c4f056928881686.jpg" ], "publish_time": 1635855050, "ctime": 1635854902, "stats": { "view": 860, "favorite": 13, "like": 1080, "dislike": 0, "reply": 14, "share": 2, "coin": 4, "dynamic": 0 }, "attributes": 24, "words": 220, "origin_image_urls": [ "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/article\/936ebe93e560baf342c7d563375e117c9392e922.jpg" ], "list": null, "is_like": false, "media": { "score": 0, "media_id": 0, "title": "", "cover": "", "area": "", "type_id": 0, "type_name": "", "spoiler": 0, "season_id": 0 }, "apply_time": "", "check_time": "", "original": 1, "act_id": 0, "dispute": null, "authenMark": null, "cover_avid": 0, "top_video_info": null, "type": 0 }
